statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_network_changes
SELECT upgrade_id, upgrade_name FROM blockchain_network_changes
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_description FROM blockchain_network_changes
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network_changes ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC
SELECT upgrade_id, upgrade_name, upgrade_date FROM blockchain_network_changes WHERE upgrade_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network_changes WHERE upgrade_name = 'Bitcoin Core'
SELECT upgrade_id, upgrade_name FROM blockchain_network_changes ORDER BY upgrade_id DESC
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network_changes WHERE upgrade_date > '2022-01-01' AND upgrade_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_upgrades FROM blockchain_network_changes
SELECT upgrade_id, upgrade_name, COUNT(*) AS total_upgrades FROM blockchain_network_changes GROUP BY upgrade_id, upgrade_name ORDER BY total_upgrades DESC
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network_upgrades
SELECT upgrade_id, upgrade_name FROM blockchain_network_upgrades ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_date FROM blockchain_network_upgrades WHERE upgrade_date > NOW()
SELECT upgrade_description FROM blockchain_network_upgrades WHERE upgrade_name = 'Protocol Upgrade'
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network_changes WHERE change_type = 'Bug Fix' ORDER BY change_date ASC
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network_upgrades ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC;
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_description FROM blockchain_network_upgrades WHERE upgrade_id = '1234';
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_description FROM blockchain_network_upgrades WHERE upgrade_name LIKE '%upgrade%';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network_changes WHERE change_type = 'hard fork' ORDER BY change_date ASC;

SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_description, change_date FROM blockchain_network_upgrades JOIN blockchain_network_changes ON blockchain_network_upgrades.upgrade_id = blockchain_network_changes.upgrade_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_upgrades;
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_date FROM blockchain_upgrades WHERE upgrade_name = 'Upgrade Alpha';
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_date, upgrade_description FROM blockchain_upgrades ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC;
SELECT change_id, change_type, change_description FROM network_changes WHERE change_type = 'Security Update';
SELECT log_details, log_date FROM upgrade_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM upgrade_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC, log_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_date FROM blockchain_upgrades WHERE upgrade_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY upgrade_date ASC;

SELECT u.upgrade_name, c.change_type, l.log_details FROM blockchain_upgrades u INNER JOIN network_changes c ON u.upgrade_id = c.upgrade_id INNER JOIN upgrade_logs l ON c.change_id = l.change_id WHERE u.upgrade_id = 3;

SELECT u.upgrade_name, c.change_type, l.log_details FROM upgrade_logs l INNER JOIN network_changes c ON l.change_id = c.change_id INNER JOIN blockchain_upgrades u ON c.upgrade_id = u.upgrade_id WHERE c.change_type = 'Bug Fix' LIMIT 5;

SELECT u.upgrade_name, COUNT(c.change_type) AS change_count FROM blockchain_upgrades u INNER JOIN network_changes c ON u.upgrade_id = c.upgrade_id GROUP BY u.upgrade_name HAVING COUNT(c.change_type) > 1;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_upgrades;
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_date FROM blockchain_upgrades ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC;
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_description FROM blockchain_upgrades WHERE upgrade_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT change_description, affected_blockchain FROM network_changes WHERE change_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ud.upgrade_name, cd.affected_entity FROM upgrade_details ud JOIN change_details cd ON ud.detail_id = cd.detail_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_upgrades;
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_date FROM blockchain_upgrades ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC;
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_description FROM blockchain_upgrades WHERE upgrade_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY upgrade_date;

SELECT nu.change_description, bd.detail_description, nc.affected_blockchain FROM network_changes nc JOIN change_details cd ON nc.change_id = cd.change_id JOIN upgrade_details bd ON bd.detail_id = cd.detail_id JOIN blockchain_upgrades bu ON bd.upgrade_id = bu.upgrade_id WHERE bu.upgrade_name LIKE 'ABC%';

SELECT nc.change_description, nc.change_date, bu.upgrade_name FROM network_changes nc, blockchain_upgrades bu JOIN change_details cd ON nc.change_id = cd.change_id JOIN upgrade_details bd ON cd.detail_id = bd.detail_id WHERE bd.detail_description LIKE '%important%' OR nc.change_description LIKE '%critical%' ORDER BY nc.change_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network_updates;
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_date FROM blockchain_network_updates WHERE upgrade_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT version_number, version_description FROM blockchain_version ORDER BY version_number DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_timestamp FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE block_timestamp < '2022-05-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'SEND';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network_updates ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_description FROM blockchain_network_updates WHERE upgrade_date >= '2022-01-01' AND upgrade_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT upgrade_name FROM blockchain_network_updates WHERE upgrade_description ILIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'transfer' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT block_id, block_timestamp FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE block_timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day' ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
